accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Play written and directed by Barbara Kahn, performed at theTheater for the New City from March 17 through April 3, 2011. Included one CD of photographs (removed to 6317/011 AV).

did.unittitle: Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition Press Kit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Literature for 11 Triangle Fire Commemoration events and 2 books. Includes blank registration form to join the Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Featuring Birds on Fire; Fabric, Flames, and Fervor; Susan Harris: Remembering Their Prayers; Images of America: The New York City Triangle Factory Fire; Remember the Triangle Fire Coalition; and the Centennial Commemoration Workers United.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Presented by First Class on March 14, 2011

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Cards and stickers. Front of cards have an inspirational quote, sheet of ten cards. The stickers each contain the name and age of a victim, sheet of 80 stickers. For assembled cards see 6317/001 MB.
